variable.name: Patient_ID
variable.description: Deidentified subject's ID

variable.name: Age_at_first_visit
variable.description: Age of subject at date of study entry

variable.name: Gender
variable.description: Gender of subject

variable.name: Race
variable.description: Ethnicity of subject

variable.name: Other Race
variable.description: Other ethnicity

variable.name: Hispanic
variable.description: Hispanic origin

variable.name: Smoking_status
variable.description: Smoking history and status

variable.name: Born_in_US
variable.description: Country of birth

variable.name: Other Country
variable.description: Other country of birth

variable.name: Alcohol Consumption
variable.description: Alcohol consumption

variable.name: Diagnosis
variable.description: Clinical diagnosis

variable.name: Visit Date
variable.description: Day in study of first clinical visit

variable.name: time pH < 4.0
variable.description: Percentage of 48 hours that pH is < 4.0

variable.name: Heartburn
variable.description: Subject experienced heartburn in past 2 montths

variable.name: Reflux
variable.description: Acid or food reflux, sour taste

variable.name: Cold
variable.description: Subject had a cold in past 1 month

variable.name: Asthma
variable.description: Subject has chronic asthma

variable.name: FH-GERD
variable.description: Family history of GERD

variable.name: FH-EA
variable.description: Family history of Esophageal cancer

variable.name: Antacids
variable.description: Use of antacids in past 3 months

variable.name: Steroids
variable.description: Use of steroids in past 3 months

variable.name: Antibiotics
variable.description: Use of antibiotics in past 3 months

variable.name: PPI
variable.description: Use of proton pump inhibitors in past 3 months

variable.name: Aspirin
variable.description: Use of aspirin in past 3 months

variable.name: H2 Blockers
variable.description: Use of H2 blockers in past 3 months

variable.name: Criteria
variable.description: Subject recruitment criteria. For detailed description of the criteria, please see document "Inclusion and Exclusion Criteria 1" and "Inclusion and Exclusion Criteria 0."
